meta.style: raw, high-contrast night photography, intense color saturation, no artificial smoothing, authentic flash-like illumination from below
meta.composition: Medium close-up, subject leaning against the pool edge, centered in frame, looking directly into the lens

scene.location: Outdoors at a swimming pool edge at night
environment: Dark, indistinct background with a fence line
Wet concrete or stone pool coping

lighting.source: Strong LED pool lights located directly beneath the subject
lighting.effect: Intense, saturated blue light cast upwards onto the torso and face, creating dramatic shadows and highlighting wet textures, with little to no ambient light from above

subject.identity: The specific young woman with long wavy platinum blonde hair and striking blue/grey eyes.

face_details.hair: Long, wet platinum blonde hair, slightly tousled and pushed back, dripping water, illuminated vividly blue
face_details.eyes: Striking blue/grey eyes looking intently and directly at the camera, reflecting the blue light
face_details.skin: Wet skin texture glistening with water droplets, showing natural pores, strongly tinted by the blue light source
face_details.expression: A neutral, confident, slightly sultry gaze directly at the viewer with relaxed lips

body.pose: Leaning forward against the pool edge, chest above water, both hands resting firmly on the pool coping, shoulders relaxed
body.physique: Fit figure visible above the waterline

outfit.attire: A dark blue or slate grey triangle bikini top
outfit.fit: Fitted snugly, showing the straps over the shoulders, wet fabric texture

realism_focus.textures: Extreme focus on individual wet hair strands, glistening water droplets on shoulders and chest, the wet texture of the bikini fabric, and the rough texture of the pool edge
realism_focus.imperfections: Authentic digital noise from night photography, realistic light bloom from the intense blue water, slight chromatic aberration typical of smartphone cameras at night
